bike.description: Specialized FSR technology optimized for BRAIN shock, M4 Alloy w/ ORE technology, fully butted and manipulated, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, disc tabs only, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Specialized BRAIN shock, manufactured by Fox Racing Shox, air spring and rebound adj., 11.7" eye to eye, 1.875" stroke
Rock Shox SID Team, 80mm travel, Dual Air, external rebound adj., compression lock-out, Alloy steerer
1 1/8" Threadless, 3x sealed, black alloy cups, cartridge bearings, ultralight alloy top cap and bolt
Aluminum, 4 bolt, 7 degree rise, black
Specialized XC Low Rise bar, 2014 Alloy, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
Avid SD Ti, Rim Wrangler cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Avid SD Ti, Rim Wrangler cartridge pads, lightweight compressionless housings
Shimano M-960 XTR
Shimano M-750 XT, 34.9mm clamp, bottom pull
Shimano M-952 XTR, long cage, standard spring
Shimano M-960 XTR, STI integrated shifter/lever combination, 9 speed
Shimano M-750 XT, 11/34
Shimano HG73
Shimano Deore XT, splined
44Ax32Ax22A, 7050 alloy 4mm thick outer ring, 4 bolt 104/64mm pattern, Alloy chainring bolts, self-extracting crank bolts
Shimano ES-70 XT, Octalink spline, 68mm shell width, 113mm spindle length
Shimano 515 clipless
Mavic X517, 26", black, welded seam, machined sidewalls, eyelets
Specialized Stout, 28 hole, cartridge bearings, 9mm Skraxle
DT Onyx, 32 hole, cartridge bearings, alloy Q/R
DT Swiss Revolution 1.8/1.5/1.8mm butted, stainless steel, black, alloy nipples 251/251mm front, 261/262mm rear
Specialized S-Works Roll-X 2.0, aramid bead, 127 tpi, S-Works compound
Specialized S-Works Roll-X 2.0, aramid bead, 127 tpi, S-Works compound
Specialized Ultralight, presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry technology, leather cover, abrasion resistant corner panels, Titanium rails
2014 Alloy, black, 30.9 x 350/400mm
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, seatpost water bottle mount, reflectors, owners manual
